
aws
***


DESCRIPTION
===========

The AWS Command Line Interface is a unified tool that provides a
consistent interface for interacting with all parts of AWS.

   aws [options] service operation [parameters]

Use "aws service help" for information on a specific service.


OPTIONS
=======

"--output <output_format>"
   * json

   * table

   * text

"--region <region_name>"
   * ap-northeast-1

   * ap-southeast-1

   * ap-southeast-2

   * eu-west-1

   * sa-east-1

   * us-east-1

   * us-gov-west-1

   * us-west-1

   * us-west-2

"--no-verify-ssl"
   Override default behavior of verifying SSL certificates

"--version"
   Display the version of this tool

"--debug"
   Turn on debug logging

"--profile <profile_name>"
   Use a specific profile from your credential file

"--color"
   Turn on/off color output. * auto * off * on

"--endpoint-url <endpoint_url>"
   Override service's default URL with the given URL


Available Services
==================

* autoscaling

* cloudformation

* cloudwatch

* datapipeline

* directconnect

* ec2

* elasticbeanstalk

* elastictranscoder

* elb

* emr

* iam

* importexport

* opsworks

* rds

* redshift

* s3

* ses

* sns

* sqs

* storagegateway

* sts

* support

* swf
